name: plugin-external-push
description: Publisher which connects to allows data to be pushed into the system

scripts.compile: npx tsc && rm -f jest.config.js && rm -rf build/src/tests
scripts.build-linux: mkdir -p dist/linux && npx pkg --targets node16-linux-x64 --output dist/linux/PluginExternalPush build/src/main.js
scripts.build-osx: mkdir -p dist/osx && npx pkg --targets node16-macos-x64 --output dist/osx/PluginExternalPush build/src/main.js
scripts.build-win: mkdir -p dist/win && npx pkg --targets node16-win-x64 --output dist/win/PluginExternalPush build/src/main.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build-linux && npm run build-osx && npm run build-win
scripts.copy-linux: mkdir -p dist/linux && cp LICENSE dist/linux/LICENSE && cp manifest.json dist/linux/manifest.json && cp icon.png dist/linux/icon.png
scripts.copy-osx: mkdir -p dist/osx && cp LICENSE dist/osx/LICENSE && cp manifest.json dist/osx/manifest.json && cp icon.png dist/osx/icon.png
scripts.copy-win: mkdir -p dist/win && cp LICENSE dist/win/LICENSE && cp manifest.json dist/win/manifest.json && cp icon.png dist/win/icon.png
scripts.copy: npm run copy-linux && npm run copy-osx && npm run copy-win
scripts.zip: npm run zip-linux && npm run zip-osx && npm run zip-win
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run zip
scripts.generate: cd proto && npx buf generate && cd ..

author: Aunalytics Inc.
